articles.content: NEW YORK (CBSNewYork) — Drug company Eli Lilly has received emergency use authorization for its antibody drug, which is similar to the antibody drug President Donald Trump received after testing posi… [+2287 chars]

articles.author: Hanna Ziady and Charles Riley, CNN Business
articles.title: EU hits Amazon with antitrust charges. A huge fine could follow - CNN
articles.description: The European Union has unveiled formal antitrust charges against Amazon for abusing its dominance in online shopping and opened a second investigation into the company's business practices.
